title: The Immigrant experience: the long long journey
creator_credit: Omaha-Orange Films, Linda Gottlieb and Joan Micklin Silver
brief_description: Focuses on the problems and dreams of new immigrants in America by telling about an uprooted Polish family. Shows how they lived at the beginning of the 20th century and includes interviews with the grandfather today as he reveals his contentment with improved opportunities for his grandchildren.
